technology.short_description: Goddess of the Harvest and Bountiful Land, Isha is beloved by all the Elves of Athel Loren.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +5% for Dryad, Tree Kin, Grove Guardians and Treeman units
Cooldown: -10% to Lore of Life spells

technology.short_description: The capricious God of the Ocean is less than loyal to his followers.

effects.description: Immune to Storm and Reef attrition

technology.short_description: The Elves of Athel Loren know that each deity has a time and place.

effects.description: Leadership: +8 when laying siege or encircling

technology.short_description: A realm of eternal autumn, where the land appears to be on the verge of death for thousands of years.

effects.description: Missile damage: +10% for Grove Guardians units

technology.short_description: From the tops of mighty, tall trees, the scouts of the Asrai see all.
The kingdom of eternal summer, this realm is constantly shining with brilliant sunshine.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10% for all Elf cavalry, Hawk and Eagle units

technology.short_description: As the Oak of Ages increases in power, so does the lore of life.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -20% for all spells

technology.short_description: Spiteful spirits, a danger to all, can be unleashed upon those who would seek to harm the expanding forest.

effects.description: Causes attrition to enemy armies within your territory

technology.short_description: Loec the Trickster protects the souls of Wood Elves from Slaanesh's perverse, Ruinous reach.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10% for all Elf units
Cooldown: -10% to Lore of Shadows spells

technology.short_description: Protector of all that is hidden and lost, Ladrielle comes to the aid of those who wander the dark places of the world.

effects.description: Evasion chance when using the Worldroots: +20%

technology.short_description: Only a fool claims to have nothing to learn, the wise seek the guidance of Hoeth, Lord of Wisdom.
This powerful God of the Hunt sits side by side with his immortal love, Isha, at the heart of the Elven pantheon.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Elf Cavalry, Hawk and Eagle units
Charge bonus: +10% for Elf Cavalry, Hawk and Eagle units

technology.short_description: The aloof creator of the Elves keeps his thoughts and plans well hidden from mortal eyes.

effects.description: Cooldown: -10% to Lore of High Magic spells

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

technology.short_description: Seek out the true enemies of Athel Loren.

effects.description: Income from post-battle loot: +25% against Wood Elves

technology.short_description: The forest itself moves around the Asrai, concealing them and moving them around the battlefield.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

technology.short_description: The land of light and wonder. Mages and magic flow easily here.

effects.description: Ability: "Magic Bond" for Tree Kin and Grove Guardians units
Charge bonus: +20% for Dryads, Tree Kin and Grove Guardians units

technology.short_description: Some spirits of the forest are helpers to the Asrai, and will assist them in the rebuilding of the forest.
With the Oak of Ages at it's peak, the Wild Hunt sounds the loudest.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 when in foreign territory
Missile damage: +10% when in foreign territory

technology.short_description: Vaul the Maker works tirelessly to craft weapons to aid the Elves in the battles to come.

effects.description: Income from Resource and Crafting buildings: +10%
Armour: +10 for Elf Infantry and Cavalry units

technology.short_description: If you go down to the woods today, you might come back... changed.

effects.description: Physical resistance: 20% for Cave Bats, Feral Manticore, Giant Spiders, Great Hawks, Giant Wolves and Feral Bears units
Passive ability: "Murder of Spites" for Malevolent Treeman units

technology.short_description: When Elves dream of a great undertaking, it is Lileath whispering to them as they sleep.
As the rulers of the heavens, the Cadai watch over the Asrai.

effects.description: Forest Health: +1 per turn to all owned Magical Forests
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for Lore of Life and Lore of High Magic

technology.short_description: A desperate and ruined land, tainted by the blood of Morghur when he was slain here.

effects.description: Reload time reduction: +10% for Waywatchers units

technology.short_description: The realm holy to the Trickster's of Loec, as well as home to the Feast Halls of the Wardancers.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 for Wardancer and Bladesinger units

technology.short_description: The fickle spirits of the forest can slip between calm serenity and raging ferocity in an instant.

effects.description: Physical resistance: 10% for Tree Kin, Grove Guardians and Treeman units

technology.short_description: The Asrai build their homes amongst the branches and leaves of the Oak of Ages.

effects.description: Construction cost: -25% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings

technology.short_description: If one learns to listen, they can hear the leaves whispering of those who wish to do them harm.
Pine is plentiful and has many practical uses.

effects.description: Upkeep: -10% for all Dryad, Tree Kin, Grove Guardians and Treeman units

technology.short_description: The poplar grows fast and strong.
The oak is stalwart and sturdy.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Eternal Guard and Glade Guard units
Attribute: Expert Charge Defence for Eternal Guard units

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

technology.short_description: The leaders of the Asrai have pledged themselves to defending the Oak, their voices roar loud as they weather the storm of those who would seek to harm it.
When the Oak of Ages is flourishing, all Asrai hear its call.
The Pine Crags is a constant battleground between the Asrai and the tresppasser Dwarfs and Greenskins of the Grey Mountains.

effects.description: Melee and missile weapon damage: +10% for all Elf cavalry, Hawk and Eagle units

technology.short_description: The blessings of the Oak can help protect against the most vile magics and terrain.

effects.description: Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
Speed: +5% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
Charge bonus: +10% for all units (Rank 7 and above)

technology.short_description: The essence of life itself flows out of the Oak, healing and mending any who are dedicated to it.
Also known as the Crone, Morai Heg is the only god in the Elven pantheon who is neither Cadai or Cytharai.

effects.description: Campaign line of sight: +25% for all settlements and characters

technology.short_description: The Great Eagles of Athel Loren carry news of distant events.

effects.description: Armour-piercing weapon damage: +25 for Great Eagle units
Physical resistance: 10% for Great Eagle units
Provides line of sight over all Magical Forest regions
Beware: this will make distant foes aware of you!

technology.short_description: The willow protects with its sheltering boughs, and knows ways of healing.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10% for Dryad, Tree Kin, Grove Guardians and Treeman units
Casualty replenishment rate: +10% when in foreign territory

technology.short_description: Wisest of all who dwell in the forest of Athel Loren, the Ancients have forgotten more than most Elves learn in a lifetime.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for Lore of Beasts spells
Bound spell: "Flock of Doom" for all Ancient Treeman Lords

technology.short_description: The Asrai worship where they will, choosing to honour the gods that best fit their personalities.

effects.description: Ability: "Heroic Killing Blow" for all Glade Lords and Glade Captains
Attribute: Causes Fear for all Elf units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

technology.short_description: Fragments from long forgotten lore still contain valuable insight.
The Forge of Starlight is the domain of the makers and craftsmen of the Asrai.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +5% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile damage: +5% for all units (Rank 7 and above)

technology.short_description: The eldest dryads' twisted forms evince their cruel nature.

effects.description: Hero recruit rank: +2 for Malevolent Branchwraiths

technology.short_description: The ash knows many secrets, and provides sturdy and plentiful arrows.
The yew's branches are supple, but its berries are deadly.

effects.description: Ability: Yewberry Infusion for Dryads, Tree Kin, Grove Guardians and Treeman units

technology.short_description: The cypress is flexible, and remains standing when flame sweeps all else aside.

effects.description: Gain +5 additional Forest Health for razing Heathlands
Campaign movement range: -20% for enemy armies starting their turn in your regions
Vigour loss reduction: -20% for melee infantry units

technology.short_description: Few dare tread within the Deepwood.

effects.description: Construction cost: -20% for Military Recruitment buildings
Income from post-battle loot: +25% against High Elves

technology.short_description: The Oak of Ages is the heart of Athel Loren, where Orion is reborn every year upon his pyre.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: +10% for armies
	(own armies factionwide in owned territory)

Upkeep: -10%
	(own armies factionwide in owned territory)

technology.short_description: Ancient and wise, the Treemen are respected by all.

effects.description: Lord recruit rank: +5 for Ancient Treemen

technology.short_description: Many spoils of war are offered as tribute to the Oak of Ages, making the Asrai eager to acquire them.
For those that crave the destruction of their enemies, Ellinill is always happy to help.

effects.description: Gain +1 additional Forest Health for winning battles in Magical Forests or their Heathlands
Melee defence: +4 for all non-Elf units and characters

technology.short_description: The Tree of Woe is a symbol of Elf-kind's manifold failures.

effects.description: Attribute: Stalk for Giant Wolves and Giant Spider units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Deathblow" for Dryad, Tree Kin, Grove Guardians and Treeman units

attributes.bullet_text: Entities in this unit take damage, but cannot die.

technology.short_description: In her dark and gloomy kingdom, Ereth Khial plots new ways to reclaim the souls of the dead from Slaanesh.
The Gods of the Underworld are treacherous, but their power is undeniable.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for Lore of Shadows and Lore of Dark Magic

technology.short_description: Modryn is a realm forever in shadow, filled with spiteful creatures.

effects.description: Ability: "Noxious Cloud" for Forest Dragon units
Bonus vs large: +10 for Zoats units

technology.short_description: The largest and most prosperous of all of Athel Loren's realms. This is the realm of the Oak of Ages and the Kings Glade.

effects.description: Attribute: Stalk for all Elf cavalry, Hawk and Eagle units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

technology.short_description: Goddess of the Savage Hunt and woman spurned, Anath Raema's heart rots with vengeance.

effects.description: Bonus vs Large: +5 for all Elf Cavalry, Hawk Rider and Great Eagle units
Cooldown: -10% to Lore of Beasts spells

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Reload time reduction: +5% for Missile Infantry units

technology.short_description: Those who seek a quiet life, away from society, honour Drakira.
Those who yearn to fight in the name of honour must seek out Eldrazor.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Elf Infantry units
Physical resistance: 5% for Elf Infantry units

technology.short_description: Wrath and fire - the gifts that Addaioth offers those who worship him.

effects.description: Fire resistance: 20% for all Elf units
Weapon strength: +10% for Forest Dragons (units and mounts)

technology.short_description: The Dark Mistress of Magic, Hekarti, draws those who worship her to the darker side of magic.

effects.description: Cooldown: -10% to Lore of Dark Magic spells

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10

technology.short_description: Hukon is the Elven God of Earthquakes and one of the few surviving members of the Ellinilli.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15 for Zoats, Treemen and Forest Dragon units
Armour: +10 for Zoats, Treemen and Forest Dragon units

technology.onscreen_name: Nethu, Keeper of the Last Door
technology.short_description: The secrets of the Underworld are forbidden to those of the mortal realm. Nethu guards the pathways between them.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +10%

technology.short_description: They who give themselves over to the pursuit of pleasure would do well to court the favour of Atharti.
The Skymark is a grassland filled with the finest horsemasters on Athel Loren's southern border.

effects.description: Bonus vs large: +5 for Eternal Guard units
Attribute: Unbreakable for Eternal Guard units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

technology.short_description: A realm locked in eternal winter, this land is filled with pale statues, some carved, others frost-caged spirits imprisoned by the Asrai.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 10% for Wildwood Rangers units

technology.short_description: Cythral is a realm that has forever rejected the presence of the Asrai. The only Wood Elves here are those maintaining the waystones.

effects.description: Melee defence: +10 for Deepwood Scouts units

technology.short_description: During battle, the roots of the Oak will rise up from the earth, forming barricades and defenses for the besieged defenders of the forest.
